14 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
March 22, 1960
Mr. kichard I. Brans
Department of Psychology
University of Houston
Cullen boulevard
Houston 4, Texas
Dear Dick:
Hope icLuhara gets there soon. Hope you*11 both excuse
the infrequency and brevity of my between—trips notes.
On the road all month.
Hetty would like to use your talk in the Journal. OK?
If she has questions, once you agree, she’ll he writing
you further.
Best regards,
Harry J. Skornia
President
